column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////It's all about the dang buttercrust here.  It's flavorful
column3: and really satisfying.  I prefer the original sausage deep dish (dish deep sausage heh..) vs The Lou
column4: but both were pretty good.  In my opinion
column7: and tomato sauce are a step up from Pizzeria Uno.  If I ever come back to Chicago
column8: Lou's would definitely be a place I would revisit.
